sentence.Network_en: Strapping the skis on the roof, we boarded the hovercraft in Dover.
sentence.Network_cn: 用带子把滑水板绑在船顶后，我们就在多佛登上了气垫船。

sentence.Network_en: These hovercraft can easily outpace most boats.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些气垫船在速度上能轻而易举地超过大多数船只。

sentence.Network_en: The rubber skirts round the bottom of a hovercraft were destroyed.
sentence.Network_cn: 气垫船底部四周的橡胶护板被毁了.

entry.def: A hovercraft is a vehicle that can travel across land and water. It floats above the land or water on a cushion of air.

example.ex: Travelling at speeds of up to thirty five knots, these hovercraft can easily outpace most boats...
example.tran: 这些气垫船行驶速度最高可达35节，能够轻易地超过大多数船只。

example.ex: The expedition made the journey to its source by hovercraft.
example.tran: 探险队乘气垫船到达了它的源头。

means.word_mean: 1. a craft capable of moving over water or land on a cushion of air created by jet engines

auth_sentence.content: Your hovercraft is now ready to do some hovering!
auth_sentence.res_content: Your hovercraft is now ready to do some hovering!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your hovercraft is now ready to do some hovering!

sentences.en: Hovercraft can travel both on land and water.
The rubber skirts round the bottom of a hovercraft were destroyed.
sentences.cn: 气垫船底部四周的橡胶护板被毁了。

sentences.en: We took a hovercraft across the English Channel.
sentences.cn: 我们乘气垫船横渡英吉利海峡。
